# Jon Gerton's Web Development

This website presents services by Jon Gerton, a web developer based in Alaska, specializing in creating professional WordPress sites and custom web applications. Catering primarily to local businesses, the site emphasizes fast, affordable solutions that help clients effectively establish their online presence. It also aims to mentor junior developers while addressing specific business needs.

## Home

The homepage introduces Jon's offerings with a focus on professional WordPress sites starting from $500. It highlights the accessibility and responsiveness of the websites, alongside providing custom development options for diverse projects. 

- **Core Offerings:**
  - $500 WordPress Sites
  - Custom Web Applications
- **Call to Actions:**
  - [Get Your $500 Site](/services)
  - [View Portfolio](/projects)

## Services

This page details the various services offered, including tailored web solutions. Key service areas include:

### $500 WordPress Sites
Designed for local businesses, this package includes:
- Delivery within 5 business days
- Mobile-responsive design
- Google Maps integration
- Basic SEO setup
- 30 days of post-launch support

### Custom Web Applications
Offers custom features and solutions for unique business models. Contact is required for pricing details.

### Team Growth Accelerator
Aimed at enhancing team skills in web development with personalized mentorship and architecture guidance. Pricing is also provided on inquiry.

## About

Jon Gerton shares his background and approach to web development. With extensive experience in tech and a passion for supporting local businesses, he focuses on providing practical solutions without jargon. His commitment to fixed pricing and ongoing support sets him apart in the industry.

- **Highlights of His Background:**
  - 27 years in tech, 18+ years in web development.
  - Experience in both agency settings and independent projects.
  
- **Core Philosophy:**
  - Simple, effective solutions for businesses of all sizesâ€”whether a basic website or a complex app.

## Contact

This page serves as an open invitation for potential clients to discuss projects. Users can send messages, book calls, or connect via email.

- **Communication Options:**

  - [Schedule a Call](#)

  - [GitHub](https://github.com/jgerton)
  - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jon-gerton-8009a9393/)

## FAQ

The FAQ section answers common questions relating to the $500 WordPress sites, including delivery time, included features, and support options. 

### Key Questions Addressed:
- Typical delivery time for WordPress sites.
- Breakdown of included services in the $500 package.
- Support and maintenance options post-launch. 

## Contact Thank You

A confirmation message is displayed after a user submits an inquiry, outlining the next steps for communication and project discussion. Users are encouraged to explore the portfolio while waiting for a response.

### What's Next:
1. Review of submitted project details.
2. Expect a follow-up email with next steps.
3. Discussion scheduling if necessary.
